text: Oh. Hey, Vicente, are you getting a lot of rocks in your sandals?
Uh, yeah. Me neither.
I'm so annoyed.
Your dumb father's climbing the stump of a mountain.
You know, technically, because of the equatorial boat.
Hey. I'm thirsty.
Did anybody bring any water?
Not to worry.
Chimborazo has many treats for travelers.
But watch out, because sometimes their travelers become the treats.
Whoa! Can I keep this knife?
No. Nah.
I prefer grapefruit La Croix.
Because of the volcanic activity below.
And the grapefruit orchard above.
This stream tastes just like grapefruit.
La Croix.
Call me when you have a Sierra mist river.
Chimborazo. She is a dangerous s***.
Jeff! Watch out! Ah, sorry.
I thought that tree behind you was a monster.
Can I have this knife?
No, man, it's not like free knife day.
I recently guided an artist from Pixar up the mountain.
He was thinking of setting the next Pixar movie on Chimborazo, about a country alpaca that moves
down the mountains and gets bullied by a bunch of mean city alpacas.
I'll pack a pillow to that movie because it sounds like a snooze.
